WorkItem.Summary: RateIt does not work with jQuery 1.7.2

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting the issue. I hope to have a look at it later today.

Hi
Changeset 16115 did not solve the issue with jQuery 1.7.2.
But the rework suggested by tristantzara works like a charm.

Hi,

Thanks for reporting the issue. Could you tell me please what doesn't work?

Because on the sample page: http://www.radioactivethinking.com/rateit/example/example.htm , which works on jQuery 1.7.2 & the latest rateit (1.0.4),  everything seems to work fine.

thanks,
Gidon

Hello Gidon,

i've made more test after reading your answer and actually everything works fine with changeset 16115. i think my browser cache has played me a nasty trick in spite of multipe page refresh :/

Regard,
Bubka
